faq.question: What is Materia?
faq.answer: Materia is a learning tool creation platform used at UCF to create and deploy interactive learning widgets.

faq.question: How do I report an issue?
faq.answer: Please contact support through your institution's help desk or email support@materia.ucf.edu.

data.statusMessage: We are experiencing some performance issues. Services remain available but may be slower than usual.

maintenanceUpdates.message: Our team is investigating reports of slower than normal widget loading times. Services remain available but may experience delays.
